author: Elyse Samuels, Meg Kelly
title: How false hope spread about hydroxychloroquine to treat covid-19 — and the consequences that followed
description: President Trump earns Four Pinocchios for seizing on Internet speculation to promote a drug of unproven merit in combatting covid-19.
content:
What do you have to lose? Ill say it again: What do you have to lose? Take it. I really think they should take it. 
 Trump, at a White House news briefing, April 4
